bs-qr-code-action-qr-code-title: Title for link to open a dialog showing qr code
bs-qr-code-action-qr-code-text: Text for link to open a dialog showing qr code
bs-qr-code-action-qr-code-dialog-title: Title for dialog showing qr code
bs-qr-code-action-qr-code-dialog-alt: Alt text for image with qr code in qr code dialog
bs-qr-code-api-no-page: Fatal message for qr code api if parameter page is empty
apihelp-bs-qr-code-example-bs-qr-code: Message for example of API call
apihelp-bs-qr-code-example-bs-qr-code-wi: Message for example of API call with param 'revid'
Message for example of API call with param 'size'
bs-qr-code-alt-text:
Alt text for image with qr code. Parameter:
* $1: page title
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-page-label: Label for text input widget to specify page name
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-page-help: Help text for text input widget to specify page name
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-query-label: Label for text input widget to add additional params
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-query-help: Help text for text input widget to add additional params
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-desc-label: Label for text input widget to add a description to QR code
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-desc-help: Help text for text input widget to add a description
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-size-label: Label for dropdown widget to set size of rendered QR coe
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-size-help: Help text for dropdown widget to set size of rendered QR code
bs-qr-code-droplet-name: Text for name of droplet QR code
bs-qr-code-droplet-desc: Description text for droplet QR code
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-size-option-small: Label for option small in dropdown widget
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-size-option-medium: Label for option medium in dropdown widget
bs-qr-code-tag-attr-size-option-large: Label for option large in dropdown widget
